description: Manage parent device relationships for IoT devices.

commands.name: az iot hub device-identity parent set
commands.summary: Set the parent device of a target device.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub device-identity parent set --device-id
                                      --parent-device-id
                                      [--auth-type {key, login}]
                                      [--force]
                                      [--hub-name]
                                      [--login]
                                      [--resource-group]
examples: az iot hub device-identity parent set -d {device_id} --pd {edge_device_id} -n {iothub_name}
az iot hub device-identity parent set -d {device_id} --pd {edge_device_id} -n {iothub_name} --force

commands.name: az iot hub device-identity parent show
commands.summary: Get the parent device of a target device.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub device-identity parent show --device-id
                                       [--auth-type {key, login}]
                                       [--hub-name]
                                       [--login]
                                       [--resource-group]
examples: az iot hub device-identity parent show -d {device_id} -n {iothub_name}
